## Question 14
**Chapter 4 exercises 2**

```{r}
hornerpoly<-function(x,c){
  a<- matrix(0,length(x),length(c))
  for(i in (length(c)-1):1){
    a[,i] <- a[,i+1]*x+c[i]
  }
  return(a[,1])
}

```
